## IEngineConfig interface

Engine configuration.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IEngineConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [\_\_boxSlack?](./yoha.iengineconfig.__boxslack.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> For internal use. |
|  [\_\_userFriendlyCoordinateOrder?](./yoha.iengineconfig.__userfriendlycoordinateorder.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> For internal use. |
|  [minHandPresenceProbabilityThreshold?](./yoha.iengineconfig.minhandpresenceprobabilitythreshold.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> If the classifiers probability of a hand being present falls below this threshold the engine will use the box model to look out for a hand. Default is <code>0.5</code>. |
|  [mirrorX?](./yoha.iengineconfig.mirrorx.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> See [MirrorCoordinatesHorizontally()](./yoha.mirrorcoordinateshorizontally.md)<!-- -->. Default is <code>true</code>. |
|  [padding?](./yoha.iengineconfig.padding.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> See [ApplyPaddingToCoordinates()](./yoha.applypaddingtocoordinates.md)<!-- -->. Default is <code>0</code>. |
